text: @chrislhayes Mike Pence is going to B in charge of the Coronavirus? That is scary.  Doctors spoke about the Coronavirus and then trump contradicted them. This virus is killing people. We don't have a cure. This is no cold or flu. We need info from the CDC who can keep us informed. Not Pence

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
